yess, piece of shit.

@fridych: The Pirate Bay now ONLY uses Magnet Links INSTEAD of .torrent (direct) downloads. (except for, like you said, a few really old ones)

This is so that they don't have to host any files AND to MAXIMIZE your download speed by offering ALL possible public trackers that are currently seeding the torrent.

When you use a magnet link in almost any torrent client, it gets added automatically.

Then it starts scraping all the trackers for seeders, then it downloads the list of files to download and starts downloading.

If you check your Sources tab under the download list, you'll see all of the trackers, and even soem seeders and leechers in the Peers tab.

It does, however, take a lot longer for a torrent to start this way, but I'd rather wait any where form as little as 30 seconds to 5 minutes in order to download a gigabyte in under 3 mins, then to wait over 10 if it started automatically using a .torrent.

.torrents usually only contain one or very few trackers, thus lowering the possibility of connecting to fast seeders and downloading a lot faster.

"If you wait, it will download."
Horrible
